channel.title: Eco-existance development team requested
channel.description:
[center]What is Eco-existance?[/center] Eco-existance is a economy based server, not just your average economy based server but a server that takes economy to another level, we're tired of seeing servers who advertise 'economy' in their description and you log on and everyone has 200b+ ! Well here at eco-existance, people earn their money. You can donate for it ofcourse but who wants to spend IRL cash on a game?! We're not the typical server that hosts the game for money but we host it for FUN and to bring ENJOYMENT to YOU. We'll be looking for active friendly players for staff and effective players by leaving feedback & suggestions. We're not completely leaving combat out though, we're improving combat one step at a time! Combat is already 100% better than your average project insanity, perfect hybirding, specs 100% effective.
Survival mini-game http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PRBTHAE-k94
Whats NEEDED
Green = Needed Red = not needed
Server development Client development Web development
[b]Application[/b] [code] Server management: Web management: Example of work: Hours active daily: Why you want to join my server development: MSN: [/code]
I can't really list everything that's needed for the server. My main goal is to improve the economy like no other source out there and create and maintain high stability. I'm looking for creative people whom are experienced enough in java to know what to do without 100% step by step C&P tutorials.
My vote4reward system:
[code]if(playerCommand.startsWith("vote")) { c.getPA().sendFrame126("www.eco-existance.x10.bz/vote.php", 12000); c.sendMessage("After voting always use ::reward for a random reward!"); }[/code]
[code]if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("reward")) { if(c.checkVotes(c.playerName)) { c.getItems().addItem(c.getPA().randomReward(), 1); c.sendMessage("Thank you for voting!"); } }[/code]
Gives random reward everytime you vote. Soon will be implementing a auth system similar to soulsplit.
Some photos of what I'm working on currently and photos of the server.
Mini-game finishing reward [URL=http://tinypic.com/r/s5d37a/7]View My Video[/URL]
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/eaigqb.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/fmp82c.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/2s0efkp.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/2hxsqc8.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/2qcnor4.jpg[/img]
[b]Custom Minigame [Completed][/b]
[IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/2a8ojh3.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/vn15iq.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/vn12du.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/ioer1k.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/ezqw4h.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/ddesl5.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/efq93p.jpg[/img]
What this minigame is about: well first of all, its a PVP mini-game that also interacts with npcs, you can grab a clan and rush through the floors for a good reward or simply creep through the floors and hope the players & npcs don't kill you before you reach the end of the floor and claim your reward. Currently theres only one floor, yes they're bugs. It's a new mini-game we hope to develop the game enough to cut out most of the bugs. They're no duping bugs in this mini-game. All items that you aquire in the mini game are deleted upon exit of the mini-game.

item.title: Eco-existance development team requested
item.dc:creator: @lugmfr lugmfr
item.description:
@lugmfr wrote:

[center]What is Eco-existance?[/center]
Eco-existance is a economy based server, not just your average economy based server but a server that takes economy to another level, we’re tired of seeing servers who advertise ‘economy’ in their description and you log on and everyone has 200b+ ! Well here at eco-existance, people earn their money. You can donate for it ofcourse but who wants to spend IRL cash on a game?! We’re not the typical server that hosts the game for money but we host it for FUN and to bring ENJOYMENT to YOU. We’ll be looking for active friendly players for staff and effective players by leaving feedback & suggestions. We’re not completely leaving combat out though, we’re improving combat one step at a time! Combat is already 100% better than your average project insanity, perfect hybirding, specs 100% effective.

Survival mini-game

Whats NEEDED

Green = Needed
Red = not needed

Server development
Client development
Web development

Application

Server management:
Web management:
Example of work:
Hours active daily:
Why you want to join my server development:
MSN:

I can’t really list everything that’s needed for the server. My main goal is to improve the economy like no other source out there and create and maintain high stability.
I’m looking for creative people whom are experienced enough in java to know what to do without 100% step by step C&P tutorials.

My vote4reward system:

if(playerCommand.startsWith("vote")) { c.getPA().sendFrame126("www.eco-existance.x10.bz/vote.php", 12000); c.sendMessage("After voting always use ::reward for a random reward!"); }

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("reward")) { if(c.checkVotes(c.playerName)) { c.getItems().addItem(c.getPA().randomReward(), 1); c.sendMessage("Thank you for voting!"); } }

Gives random reward everytime you vote. Soon will be implementing a auth system similar to soulsplit.

Some photos of what I’m working on currently and photos of the server.

Mini-game finishing reward
View My Video

Custom Minigame [Completed]

What this minigame is about: well first of all, its a PVP mini-game that also interacts with npcs, you can grab a clan and rush through the floors for a good reward or simply creep through the floors and hope the players & npcs don’t kill you before you reach the end of the floor and claim your reward. Currently theres only one floor, yes they’re bugs. It’s a new mini-game we hope to develop the game enough to cut out most of the bugs. They’re no duping bugs in this mini-game. All items that you aquire in the mini game are deleted upon exit of the mini-game.
